doctor.name: Dr. Md. Kamruzzaman
doctor.degree: MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), FCPS (Plastic Surgery), MRCS (EDIN), MRCS (UK)
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Kamruzzaman is a Plastic Surgeon in Narayanganj. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery), FCPS (Plastic Surgery), MRCS (EDIN), MRCS (UK). He is a Associate Professor, Burn & Plastic Surgery at Dhaka Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Kamruzzaman at Popular Diagnostic Center, Narayanganj is 8pm to 9pm (Only Sunday).
